AD_AudienceOfOne.synopsis: Brazier on horned statue at CTY_Main_A, Position: -58.82, -35.76, 1041.31, have this brazier unlit, and when clicked upon generate a Narrator AD

AD_UnholyDiversions.synopsis: Chasm Defence Upper Tier, Hanging Corpse at CTY_Main_A, Position: -123.25, 0.27, 1013.75

AD_AudienceOfOne_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_AudienceOfOne_0.text: *By now you've seen a lot of death, but this is mass murder staged as theatre for an audience of one: Bhaal.*

AD_UnholyDiversions_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_UnholyDiversions_0.text: *A thrill of fear tingles your spine as you realise that a single mistake will mean that you end up as a hanging target for Bhaalist daggers.*
